title: Conservation Practices from Farms to Forests and Wetlands

tasks.task: Participate in a Farm Bill briefing and panel discussions on conservation practices.
subtasks: Present an introduction to soil health and its benefits (听话的时间)

Describe the Conservation Reserve Program (CRP), Environmental Quality Incentives Program (EQIP), Conservation Stewardship Program (CSP), Agricultural Conservation Easement Program (ACEP), and Regional Conservation Partnership Program (RCPP)
Discuss the floodplain easement program's role in restoring natural habitats and reducing flood risk, highlighting underfunding and inefficiencies
Address the challenges facing Hispanic and Latinx farmers in regenerative agriculture, emphasizing the importance of cultural and economic support (大卫的演讲)
Emphasize the importance of tribal consultation and capacity building in conservation efforts (巴内特的演讲)
Unite diverse stakeholders in conservation efforts, highlighting the interconnectedness of ecosystems, water management, and socio-economic factors (结束词)
